name: sgapps.io-testing-platform
description: Testing Platform based on puppeteer and puppeteer-firefox. Offers possibility to define a scenario and run it under both browsers.

scripts.jsdoc: ./node_modules/update-markdown-jsdoc/index.js -f index.js -r readme.md -S -s API ; cat readme.md | sed -r 's/\]\(https\:\/\/git@labs.sgapps.io\/\:/\]\(https\:\/\/labs.sgapps.io\//' | sed -r 's/(\.js\x23L[0-9]+)-L[0-9]+\)/\1)/' | tee readme.md
scripts.deploy: rm -rf ./node_modules ; rm -rf package-lock.json ; npm i --only=prod && rm -rf ./node_modules/*/.git/ && npm i --local --only=prod bower && ./node_modules/bower/bin/bower --allow-root --silent install && ./node_modules/bower/bin/bower --allow-root --silent update
scripts.docs-dictionary: jsdoc -c jsdoc.json -t node_modules/tsd-jsdoc/dist -r -d . ; echo '' > index.d.ts ; cat 'node_modules/@types/puppeteer/index.d.ts' >> index.d.ts ; cat types.d.ts >> index.d.ts ; rm types.d.ts
scripts.docs-dictionary-dev: npm run docs-dictionary; while true; do find . -not -path './documentation' | entr -pd npm run docs-dictionary; done
scripts.docs-build: npm run docs ; npm run docs-dictionary
scripts.docs-dev: npm run docs-build ; while true; do find . -not -path './documentation' | entr -pd npm run docs-build ; done
